channel.title: metaviz on Epiviz
channel.description: Recent content in metaviz on Epiviz

item.title: Epiviz Updates for Bioconductor 3.5 Release
item.description: Bioconductor version 3.5 was released last month: http://bioconductor.org/news/bioc_3_5_release/. This Bioconductor version includes updates to epivizr and a new package, metavizr, for interactive visualization of metagenomic data. In this post we describe these, and take the opportunity to update on other developments in the Epiviz project. What’s new! epivizr updates Introducing Epiviz desktop application Metavizr now on R/Bioconductor Introducing epiviz webcomponents ## epivizr updates Save and Restart an epivizr session
